title: Inside the $22 trillion world of private capital, an asset class so big it would be the world's second-largest economy - Fortune
summary:
Private capital, defined by the bank as assets not available on public markets, includes private equity, private credit and real assets.
Public markets offer transparency, governance, and liquidity; private firms, by contrast, often avoid periodic reporting and undergo less rigorous oversight.
Capital allocation goes private Historically, public companies were seen as the best vehicles for capital efficiency.
Yet, private capital is rewriting the rules.
“You could see an age when private equity, private capital allows companies to remain in a private format for longer.

title: Why ETHZilla (ETHZ) Is Up 7.3% After $15M Satschel Deal and Token Listing Rights - Yahoo Finance
summary:
We'll explore how ETHZilla's expanded access to regulated digital markets could reshape its investment narrative in asset tokenization.
What Is ETHZilla's Investment Narrative?
The recent $15 million investment for a 15% stake in Satschel, parent of Liquidity.io, and exclusive Ethereum Layer 2 token listing rights could genuinely shift ETHZilla's catalysts in the short term.
Exploring Other Perspectives Four members of the Simply Wall St Community currently estimate ETHZilla's fair value per share between US$0.5 and US$5, showing a wide spread of individual outlooks.
